Oak Park, N. Royal Oak and Huntington Woods, MI a couple days per week. I offer delivery to St. Clair Shores every few weeks. Interested in wholesale or have questions? Feel free to email me at mugsandotherjugs@gmail.com and thanks for taking a peek at my website! Buy Now Join us at Mother Handsome + Dog & Pony Show for a gathering you won't want to miss! Spooky sips, shops and bites  üëª RSVP Private Candlemaking Parties! I offer at-home candlemaking parties on weekends and select weekdays. E-mail me with questions and to setup your next party with friends and family! mugsandotherjugs@gmail.com You can find my candles for sale at these amazing retail stores. Be sure to check Facebook or Google for up-to-date business hours before visiting. Join my Loyalty Program Find the "Sign Up for Rewards" button bottom right of my page and join my rewards program! Perfect way to earn points when buying those gifts for the holiday's - you can treat yourself with your earned points! Reviews from buyers like you I've bought several incredible candle creations from Kerriann, and I adore each one! She puts so much thought into each new line, and her vessels are often unique to the point of being truly one-of-a-kind. Highly recommend this local candle maker! April D. Candles are wonderful!  Smell great, burn clean.  Large variety of fragrances and fun containers!  Make great gifts! Lynn S. Bought some candles from her fall line and LOVED them! They lasted so much longer than candles I've bought from the stores and the smell was so unique and comforting! As well, Keriann went out of her way to provide a COVID safe pick up option for me at a place that was closer to me than her house! 5/5 candles and 5/5 customer service!! Karley R. Absolutely love my candles! All the scents are wonderful and not to over powering. I feel safe to light them in the house with animals and family who have sensitivity to scents!! Thank you Kerriann for your amazing and fun products, I‚Äôll be a happy returning customer!! Katelyn C. Kerriann is very passionate about what she does! I love all of the candles I‚Äôve ever gotten from her & I‚Äôm not just saying that because I‚Äôm her sister. I have several of her hand-poured candles and my favorite scent is honey/lavender. The candles are all so unique and I love that each of them have a way to repurpose. I have a few that I‚Äôll eventually turn into pots for plants, a few that will become coffee mugs and a few that could stand alone as decor. I love that the purpose of her business is to reduce waste by reusing vintage finds, coffee mugs and other pieces. Overall, I highly recommend Mugs & Other Jugs! Courtney K. A great variety of scents. There are fruity and for lack of better words "energizing" scents to calming and relaxing scents. All natural wax with little to no smoke. My personal favorite thing about these is she reuses cute and decorative containers that she finds! I burn these candles while I'm working from home. It makes my job a little less stressful. Highly recommend the white sage and lavender scent of your looking to relax. Mitch B. Kerrianne‚Äôs candles are not only beautiful but smell amazing! As someone who has always been sensitive to harsh fragrances from commercial stores, I am thrilled that I can enjoy candles again.  Every scent is a perfect blend of different notes that create an inviting but not overpowering smell. Liz J. I‚Äôve purchased several candles from Kerriann for myself and as gifts for others, and I have been so happy with all of them! People especially love the Michigan dough bowls and the mug candles. I‚Äôve also done two candle making classes (one in-home and one in a store) and both were super fun. Kerriann does a great job teaching you how to take care of your candles, too. I highly recommend Mugs & Other Jugs for all of your candle needs! Amy G. These candles and their vessels strike me as being very professional despite being a small local business, and it makes me happy that i can shop local and support small businesses - the candles smell great, even when they‚Äôre not burning, and if the owner lives near you, she‚Äôll hand deliver them... for a convenient, contactless porch drop off. Def recommend - you WILL find something you like! Sarah Z.
